sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { IProduct } from 'src/app/interfaces/i-product'; import { SharedService } from 'src/app/services/shared.service'; import { SupabaseService } from 'src/app/services/supabase.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products-list', templateUrl: './products-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products-list.component.css'] }) export class ProductsListComponent implements OnInit { constructor( private productsService: SupabaseService, private sharedService: SharedService ){} productes: IProduct[] = []; filtre: string = ''; ngOnInit(): void { this.productsService.productsSubject.subscribe( (prods: IProduct[]) => this.productes = prods, // Success function ); this.productsService.getProducts(); this.sharedService.filtre.subscribe( (f: string) => this.filtre = f ) } }
